@graph.name: Shopify Etsy Integration Tool
@graph.description: Integrate Shopify with Etsy to sync inventory, orders, and product details between both platforms. Manage multichannel selling from one dashboard with automated syncing and order fulfillment.
featureList: Auto-sync inventory between Shopify and Etsy

offers.description: Free integration guide and tool recommendations

audience.audienceType: Shopify store owners, Etsy sellers, multichannel merchants

@graph.name: How to Connect Shopify and Etsy in 4 Steps
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to integrate Shopify store with Etsy marketplace in under 10 minutes

supply.name: Integration app from Shopify App Store

step.name: Install Integration App
step.text: Install the integration app from the Shopify App Store (e.g., CedCommerce or Marketplace Connect)

step.name: Authenticate Etsy Account
step.text: Authenticate your Etsy shop using your login credentials

step.name: Configure Sync Preferences
step.text: Select syncing preferences like auto-import, pricing rules, and inventory sync direction

step.name: Test Integration
step.text: Start syncing products and test by pushing one product live

mainEntity.name: Can I sync product videos between Shopify and Etsy?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, apps like QuickSync allow you to transfer product videos from Shopify to Etsy seamlessly. This helps sellers who rely on videos to showcase features.

mainEntity.name: How can I avoid double taxation when syncing prices between Shopify and Etsy?

acceptedAnswer.text: Use VAT-syncing options in apps like Etsy Integration by DPL. These apps ensure Etsy prices include VAT and sync properly with Shopify without being taxed again.

mainEntity.name: Is it possible to integrate Shopify and Etsy without using third-party apps?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, but it's manual and error-prone. You must export CSVs from one store and import into the other. Syncing inventory and orders this way is not recommended for active sellers.

mainEntity.name: Can I customize which product attributes are synced between Shopify and Etsy?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, apps like InfoShore offer detailed sync profiles. You can control images, descriptions, SKUs, and tags for each listing.

mainEntity.name: What happens if my Etsy shop uses a different currency than my Shopify store?

acceptedAnswer.text: Currency converters built into apps like Etsy Marketplace Integration handle conversions automatically. This allows seamless cross-border selling without pricing errors.
